//   sampler2D SceneColorTexture;

//   UniformPixelVector_3         c10      1
//   UniformPixelVector_4         c11      1

//   LightColorAndFalloffExponent c14      1
//   SceneColorTexture            s0       1
//   PixelTexture2D_0             s1       1
//   PixelTexture2D_1             s2       1
//   PixelTextureCube_0           s3       1
//

    ps_3_0
    def c3, 0.899999976, 1.5, 2, -1
    def c6, 2.5, 3.5, -9.99999997e-007, 1.20000005
    def c7, 0, 15, 0, 0
    dcl_color v0.xyz
    dcl_color1 v1
    dcl_texcoord v2.xy
    dcl_texcoord4_pp v3.xyz
    dcl_texcoord5 v4.xyz
    dcl_texcoord6 v5.xyz
    dcl_texcoord7 v6.xyw
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1
    dcl_2d s2
    dcl_cube s3

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s15

// Unreal Engine SceneColorTexture halo fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --fix-unreal-halo-sct --only-autofixed --stereo-sampler-ps=s15 CRC32_2A199969_1142.txt
mov r30.xyw, v6
texldl r31, c220.z, s15
add r31.w, r30.w, -r31.y
mad r30.x, r31.w, r31.x, r30.x

    dp3 r0.x, v4, v4
    add r1, -r0.x, -c3.w
    mov_sat r0.x, r0.x
    add r0.x, -r0.x, -c3.w
    pow r2.x, r0.x, c14.w
    mov r0, r1
    texkill r0
    mov r0.xyw, c3
    mad r0.xy, v2, r0, c9
    texld r3, r0, s1
    mad r0.xyz, r3, c3.z, c3.w
    mul r1.xyz, r0, c12.y
    mov r3.xy, c6
    mad r2.yz, v2.xxyw, r3.xxyw, c10.xxyw
    texld r3, r2.yzzw, s2
    mad r2.yzw, r3.xxyz, c3.z, c3.w
    mul r3.xyz, r2.yzww, c12.y
    mul r0.xyz, r0, r3
    mad r1.xyz, r2.yzww, r1, -r0
    dp3 r2.y, v5, v5
    rsq r2.y, r2.y
    mad r2.z, v5.z, -r2.y, -c3.w
    mul r3.xyz, r2.y, v5
    cmp r2.y, r3.z, r2_abs.z, -c3.w
    add r2.z, r2.y, c6.z
    pow r3.w, r2.y, c6.w
    cmp r2.y, r2.z, r3.w, c7.x
    add r2.z, r2.y, c6.z
    pow r3.w, r2.y, c12.z
    cmp r2.y, r2.z, r3.w, c7.x
    mad r0.xyz, r2.y, r1, r0
    mul_pp r0.xyz, r0, c8
    nrm_pp r1.xyz, r0
    dp3 r0.x, r1, r3
    mul r0.xyz, r0.x, r1
    mad r0.xyz, r0, c3.z, -r3
    nrm_pp r3.xyz, v1
    nrm_pp r4.xyz, v0
    mul_pp r5.xyz, r3.zxyw, r4.yzxw
    mad_pp r5.xyz, r3.yzxw, r4.zxyw, -r5
    dp3 r3.z, r3, r0
    dp3 r3.x, r4, r0
    mul r4.xyz, r5, v1.w
    dp3 r3.y, r4, r0
    texld r3, r3, s3
    mul r3.xyz, r2.y, r3
    add_sat r2.y, r2.y, c13.x
    mov r2.w, c12.w
    mad r3.xyz, r2.w, r3, c11
    add r4.xyz, -r0.w, -c0
    mul_pp r3.xyz, r3, r4
    mad_pp r3.xyz, r3, c4.w, c4
    nrm_pp r4.xyz, v3
    dp3_sat_pp r0.x, r0, r4
    dp3_sat_pp r0.y, r1, r4
    pow_pp r1.x, r0.x, c7.y
    add r0.x, r0.x, c6.z
    mul_pp r1.xyz, r1.x, c5
    cmp_pp r1.xyz, r0.x, r1, c7.x
    add r0.x, r0.y, c6.z
    cmp_pp r0.x, r0.x, r0.y, c7.x
    mad_pp r0.xyz, r3, r0.x, r1
    mul r0.xyz, r2.x, r0
    mul r3.xyz, r0, c14
    rcp r0.x, r30.w
    mul r0.xy, r0.x, r30
    mad r4.xy, r0, c1, c1.wzzw
    mov r4.zw, c7.x
    texldl r4, r4, s0
    add r0.x, -r0.w, -c2.y
    add r0.x, -r0.x, r4.w
    rcp r0.x, r0.x
    mad r0.x, -c2.x, r0.x, -r30.w
    rcp r0.y, c13.y
    mul_sat r0.x, r0.y, r0.x
    mul r3.w, r0.x, r2.y
    cmp oC0, -r1.w, c7.x, r3

// approximately 94 instruction slots used (5 texture, 89 arithmetic)
